sourcesContent:
import { OrbitControls } from '@react-three/drei'
import { useHelper } from '@react-three/drei'
import Sphere from './Sphere'
import Floor from './Floor'
import { useRef } from 'react'
import { DirectionalLightHelper, HemisphereLightHelper} from 'three'

export default function Experience() {
   
    const directionalLightRef = useRef()
    const hemisphereLightHelper = useRef()

   // useHelper(directionalLightRef, DirectionalLightHelper, 1)
    useHelper(hemisphereLightHelper, HemisphereLightHelper, 'cyan')
 
    return <>
        <OrbitControls makeDefault/>
        <directionalLight  ref={hemisphereLightHelper} castShadow={true} position={[0, 10, -6]} intensity={1.5} shadow-mapSize={ [ 1024, 1024 ] }/>
        <ambientLight intensity={0.3} />

        <Sphere/>
        <Floor/>
    </>
}
